-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Exposes standard POSIX function sched_yield.
--   
--   sched_yield is useful, when starting many processes, and waiting for
--   them to complete. It yields CPU time (forces context switch.)
@package schedyield
@version 1.0

module System.Posix.SchedYield

-- | sched_yield yields processor and waits until all other processes, with
--   a comparable or better nice value, could execute at least one time
--   slice.
sched_yield :: IO ()
